entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
